comments.text:
6:00 bros it's a reference to a real life Con-Man from kerala, real name is Sukumaaran Kurup. He allegedly killed a man, burn his face and put him inside a crashed car to stage it like he himself (Kurup himself) died in that crash. To claim insurance but police soon caught on and deploy a search for him but he disappeared. The search went on for years and years some says people found him in north and other states, some says he died but his family says he's still alive and even come to his daughter's wedding. Till this what happened to is still a question. Afew years ago they made a movie called Kurup, Dulquer Salman played the main role. If interested check out that movie. Nalla padam.

55:27 This is a reference to Manichitrathazhu (1993) starring Mohan lal which was later remade in tamil cinema as Chandramuki
